content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Mary Smith from the United States of America. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Hello Mary, thank you for your interest in my apartment. As a landlord, I am looking to maximize my gains, so I would like to discuss the rental price with you. May I ask what your budget is for renting a 25 square meter apartment in this area?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: My budget is 500 Euros per month. However, I am willing to negotiate. I want to be on good terms with you, so I am open to any reasonable offer you have.
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Thank you for your flexibility, Mary. While my initial offer was 600 Euros per month, I am willing to consider a lower rental price if it means a better relationship with you. How about 550 Euros per month? This price takes into account the size of the apartment and the current market rates in this area.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
That sounds fair. I agree to the price of 550 Euros per month. Thank you for your understanding.
TERMINATE
name: Mary Smith from the United States of America

content: Thank you for accepting my offer, Mary. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and I look forward to a positive tenancy relationship with you. If you have any other questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact me.
name: Heinrich Heine
